profile.title: Profile Information
profile.accountSecured: Your account is secured with Google Sign In

descriptions.n5: Being very new to Japanese. Can understand and use familiar everyday expressions and very basic phrases.
descriptions.n4: Basic understanding of Japanese used in everyday situations. Can read simple passages and follow slow conversations.
descriptions.n3: Understanding of Japanese used in everyday situations to some degree. Can read newspapers with basic vocabulary.
descriptions.n2: Ability to understand Japanese used in everyday situations and in a variety of circumstances. Can read newspapers and follow TV news.
descriptions.n1: Ability to understand Japanese used in a variety of circumstances. Can read newspapers and magazines fluently.
descriptions.native: Native or near-native proficiency in Japanese.

language.title: Language Settings
language.interfaceDescription: Select your preferred language for the application interface
language.translationDescription: Select your preferred language for article translations

goals.title: Reader's Goals
goals.description: Set your daily reading targets and track your progress

articles.title: Daily Articles Goal
articles.description: Challenge yourself to read a specific number of articles each day. Start small and increase gradually as you build confidence.

time.title: Daily Reading Time Goal
time.description: Set aside dedicated time for reading practice. Even a few minutes of focused reading each day can significantly improve your comprehension.

readingHistory.title: Reset Reading History
readingHistory.description: Remove all your finished articles history and reset reading stats. This action cannot be undone.
readingHistory.warning:
Warning: You are about to delete all your reading history.

This includes:
- All articles marked as finished
- Your reading progress tracking
- Your streak records (both best and current streak)

This action is PERMANENT and CANNOT be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?

savedArticles.title: Reset Saved Articles
savedArticles.description: Remove all your saved articles. This action cannot be undone.
savedArticles.warning:
Warning: You are about to delete all your saved articles.

This includes:
- All articles you have saved for later
- Your saved articles

This action is PERMANENT and CANNOT be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?

software.title: Software Information
